body: Call out for insight as you open His word. Remember these are Godâ€™s words, only he can give understanding, we cannot work it out by our own methods. Take a moment to consider who the passage is written to â€“ Godâ€™s people, the nations, a church an individual? Put yourself in their shoes and try to hear it as they would have heard it, how they would have felt as they read it - what might have been surprising, shocking, challenging or encouraging for them. (You may need to look at the start of the Bible book to find who it was written from and to, or look up the book on thebibleproject.com if you are stuck) Read passage out loud and slowly, noticing each word.
